title: Sergei Pinyayev
text:
Sergei Maksimovich Pinyayev (; born 2 November 2004) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays for <a href="PFC%20Krylia%20Sovetov%20Samara">Krylia Sovetov Samara</a>. He mostly plays as a <a href="left%20winger">left winger</a>, but is occasionally deployed as a <a href="right%20winger">right winger</a> as well.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Chertanovo%20Moscow">FC Chertanovo Moscow</a> on 1 August 2020 in a game against <a href="FC%20Spartak-2%20Moscow">FC Spartak-2 Moscow</a>, substituting <a href="Dmitri%20Molchanov">Dmitri Molchanov</a> in the 63rd minute. Pinyaev is the youngest player ever to score in the FNL. He scored in the game against <a href="FC%20Irtysh%20Omsk">FC Irtysh Omsk</a> at the age of 15 years, 9 months and 10 days.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> debut for <a href="PFC%20Krylia%20Sovetov%20Samara">PFC Krylia Sovetov Samara</a> on 30 July 2021 in a game against <a href="FC%20Spartak%20Moscow">FC Spartak Moscow</a>. He scored his first goal on 22 September 2021, in the 10–0 <a href="2021%E2%80%9322%20Russian%20Cup">Russian Cup</a> elite group round win against <a href="FC%20Znamya%20Truda%20Orekhovo-Zuyevo">Znamya Truda</a>. He scored his first RPL goal on 11 December 2021 against <a href="FC%20Rubin%20Kazan">FC Rubin Kazan</a> at the age of 17 years and 39 days, becoming the third youngest goal scorer in RPL history, behind <a href="Jano%20Ananidze">Jano Ananidze</a> and <a href="Aleksandr%20Salugin">Aleksandr Salugin</a>.
International career.
The youngest Russian junior national team player of all time. He made his U16 debut at the age of 13 years and 9 months.
